message.body: Hey! I have two free passes to comicon do you want one?? I figured maybe you already had one but I just got some today.
Ooooo! I would LOVE one for saturday! That's so cool! Thank you! John Carpenter and Booger from Revenge of the nerds are gonna be there!
The pass is 4 days so you can use it however you like! I'm gonna go pick them up Thursday morning at the press booth!
I can fine it to you when you get off work!
OH MY GOD ARE YOU FRIENDS WITH STAN LEE?! How did you score that?! Thank you so much!
Lol. I'm totally judging the wizard world film festival. This is how they pay.
I mean, the payment could be cooler
Have the films already been judged or does that happen at the convention?
It happens this week. We all get to rank like 12 films.
One of which is called don't feed the trolls.
Oh shit haha! That sounds great!
